section.name: Asterisk-JTAPI Testplan V1
section.p: This document contains some ideas what to test for basic support of incoming/outgoing calls signaling. Not complete, only tricky stuff noted.

subsection.name: Call Pick-Up
subsection.p: Check incoming call with pick-up. Terminal should be the destination where the pick-up occured.

subsection.name: Restart / Startup
subsection.p: Start a JTAPI application with established calls on an Asterisk PBX. JTAPI may not signal any fragments.
